Text: Major shareholders that own 10% or more of a company's shares are required to disclose their sales and purchases with the SEC.  Shares of BNED stock traded up $0.05 on Wednesday, hitting $3.35. 451,356 shares of the company's stock traded hands, compared to its average volume of 665,159.
